rows.label: bf04030120_0010
rows.name:
There was a man who climbed the World Tree,
hoping to reach Eden

rows.label: bf04030120_0020
rows.name:
But...When he arrived at Eden, 
he could not meet God.

rows.label: bf04030120_0030
rows.name:
So instead, as proof that he had 
reached God's throne...

rows.label: bf04030120_0040
rows.name: He brought back two Core Crystals, Metsu and me.

rows.label: bf04030120_0050
rows.name: And once he made it back to Alst...

rows.label: bf04030120_0060
rows.name:
Why he did it, I can't say.
For greed...for power...

rows.label: bf04030150_0010
rows.name:
When Metsu awakened, he wielded his
world-shaking power,

rows.label: bf04030150_0020
rows.name:
with no doubt, purely,
as if it was the most natural thing in the world.

rows.label: bf04030150_0030
rows.name:
I was awakened by a Driver who was
determined to stop Metsu's rampage.

rows.label: bf04030150_0050
rows.name:
I fought with all my might, and
succeeded in defeating Metsu.

rows.label: bf04030150_0060
rows.name: In that battle, three Divine Beasts sank.

rows.label: bf04030160_0012
rows.name:
I sealed this power so that 
it would never awaken again.

rows.label: bf04030160_0020
rows.name:
I took on this form, this personality, 
and fell asleep.
